content: > warm autumn colors celebrate the changing seasons and clever motifs make this whimsical crochet afghan a joy to stitch and fun to display **skill level ** intermediate turkey motif squares involve working in turned rounds and sewing halves of the body together embroider legs and beak **gauge ** turkey square = 8½ x 8½ 22 cm x 22 cm 16 sts and 16 row = 5 13 cm in texture pattern red heart® super saver® 1 skein 360 café **a** 9 skeins 981 fall **b** 2 skeins each 633 dark sage **c** and 365 coffee **d** about 5 yds or 1 skein each 254 pumpkin **e** and 376 burgundy **f** also available at lovecrafts 1 1 https //www lovecrafts com/en-us/p/turkey-talk-throw-in-red-heart-super-saver-economy-solids-lw3107
